extendedInfo.description: Septa is the transit service for Philadelphia and its surrounding counties. SeptaDroid helps you find your next regional rail train and tells you if its late. SeptaDroid contains schedule data for all buses, subways, trolleys in the Philly area.This app is not affiliated with Septa.Explanation of permissionspermission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT allows app to install shortcut on you home screenandroid.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIONandroid.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATIONBoth used to find your closest stationandroid.permission.READ_PHONE_STATEandroid.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATEused by the ads so they aren't running when display is offandroid.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGEandroid.permission.INTERNETused to download and store schedule data on you sdcardandroid.permission.VIBRATE Used by the wake up service

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I like the new update is nice and organized and provides the info that I need. Awesome. I recommend this app for all of us Septa users in Philly.
reviews.author: Marjorie Dln Rosado

reviews.title: On the fence!
reviews.comment: I find this app hard to navigate around and the map of the transit system blurry when I zoom in. I\'m from Philly and I know we can do better than this. Do settle for anything, technology is suppose to be advancing not stalling out.
reviews.author: Franklin Williams

reviews.title: It\'s okay, not great
reviews.comment: The real time updates for the train schedules are accurate around half the time. If it says the train us late, it usually is, but if it sayss a train is on time, it\'s often actually late. Occasionally it won\'t load schedules even if I have full signal and a WiFi connection. It\'s good if you want an estimate of when the next train is coming, but I don\'t trust it to be terribly accurate.
reviews.author: Rachel Skinner

reviews.title: No data!!!!!
reviews.comment: Always no info?????
reviews.author: John Pote

reviews.title: Best App for Regional Rail
reviews.comment: New update UI is slick. Only thing I would ask for is being able to search for each stop individually instead of having to scroll and find it. But kudos to the developers, keep doing what you\'re doing
reviews.author: James Gang

reviews.title: Half baked cleanup
reviews.comment: New UI is prettier.  2 big bugs I\'ve found: -Ads sometimes take up half the screen blocking the next button at least on a train search. -refreshing a search sometimes reverses the direction.  Happens for my favorites and other searches I\'ve done.  The app does work for me and I do rely on its accurate (rail) information.
reviews.author: Grant Aaron

reviews.title: Doesn\'t show all trains.
reviews.comment: I used it for the regional rail and it\'s accurate for the most part. But unfortunately, this app doesn\'t show you all the trains available for a location. Using \"SEPTA Instant\" instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: Lately (lazy 30 days) its been screwing up. Wrong times.....trying other apps
reviews.author: Rob Wadley

reviews.title: Finally! UI works!
reviews.comment: This app is and always has been simple and effective. However, like much of SEPTA\'s efforts, it lacked some seemingly obvious features, like the ability to easily see the return schedules. In the latest update, the quirks have finally been ironed out. If you ride SEPTA, this app is a necessity.
reviews.author: Alex Rudinski

reviews.title: Doesn\'t \"see\" all buses, but accurate when it does
reviews.comment: This app has all the transit schedules and a live bus tracker. The tracker part doesn\'t always detect every bus (sometimes you get a bus that it pulls up in front of you that didn\'t appear on the map, but its been very accurate with the buses it can see. I wish there were better features in the live GPS view like a refresh button or the ability to save favorite routes and toggle between them.
reviews.author: Amanda Zacharias

reviews.title: Fickle
reviews.comment: Sometimes this app works and sometimes it doesn\'t. Why doesn\'t it outline the routes for the map anymore? Lame.
reviews.author: Linda Ruan

reviews.title: It\'s better except one problem
reviews.comment: For some reason it\'s happened to me even b4 the update it doesn\'t show the number 1 schedule on Saturdays it shoes all other days except because the bus doesn\'t run on that day but it does run on Saturdays so why doesn\'t it show any times??? Please fix other then that it works pretty good in my phone
reviews.author: Roberto Encinosa

reviews.title: Love the new UI
reviews.comment: But can you please give us an offline feature for when underground. Other than that its great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless! Use SEPTAInstant!
reviews.comment: This is helpful only in the fact that it exists. Basically, it just gives you the schedules of routes, which, occasionally, can\'t even be relied upon. That\'s inexcusable when you consider that even Google MAPS is more accurate (about 8:10). And the Google map feature built into it is worthless. I highly suggest downloading SEPTAInstant instead - it\'s waaay better.
reviews.author: Robert Branch

reviews.title: Please Re-Update
reviews.comment: A couple of updates ago they made it so the arrival time gets printed over by the arrival time and can no longer read the departure time. It doesn\'t happen on all schedules but it does when the location is long worded. Would give 5 stars if they just abbreviate the word station or street. Especially 30th Street Station.
reviews.author: Vince Valiante

reviews.title: 2 years later...
reviews.comment: Bus 115 still wrong!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: I previously gave this app 1 star because of constant crashing and not displaying weekend bus schedules. The new UI is so much better and no more crashes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Trying to load schedule for a Saturday , FAIL
reviews.comment: I keep Trying to load schedule for today Saturday.  and it just says Currently No Data.  I have a full data connection as well as I am on my wifi, this was working fine last night, and now is of no use to me if it cant pull up any data.
reviews.author: Mike Rizzo

reviews.title: Mostly good
reviews.comment: The only thing I find annoying about this app is that it does not show the Saturday schedule for the 310.  Other than that, I use this pretty much everyday to get to work.
reviews.author: Jason Keal

reviews.title: Fixed time overlay
reviews.comment: Departure time isn\'t overlayed by station stop anymore. No complaints at this time. Thanks for continuing to improve this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
